data.name: Crystal Plague Demo
data.detailed_description: In this demo of the Crystal Plague game, you can fully complete the first biome - Ash Ruins. Try the game for two characters - a robber and a warlock. Learn perks and skill upgrades to try your build and defeat the demo boss - Lava Golem. Over 5 locations, 4 types of monsters, traps and lava will try to stop you.
data.about_the_game: In this demo of the Crystal Plague game, you can fully complete the first biome - Ash Ruins. Try the game for two characters - a robber and a warlock. data.short_description: Dynamic and harsh roguelike in a dark fantasy setting. Nice graphics, complexity and pleasant gameplay. Let's kill them all and defeat the crystal plague!
